name: Masterchef Chinese Food Edition
description:
Masterchef Chinese Food Edition is an exciting fast food simulation game. You just opened a chinese restaurant, let's see how fast you can satisfy your customers

Even if you're not a chef, with this game you will learn step by step very fast how to do your favorite chinese food like noodles, dumplings and more.

Game Features:
- More than 100 combinations to prepare the dishes
- 5 types of chinese food to choose to prepare: noodles, dim sum, dumplings, spring rolls and fortune cookies
- Strive to make good food every time so that you can consume it in the end
